attributes.action: IMMEDIATE SNAP GENERAL ELECTION FOR A NEW GOVERNMENT TO TAKE CHARGE
attributes.additional_details:
The conservatives have been in turmoil since David cammerons Brexit referendum. They have continously failed in leadership with major issues facing the country which include brexit, the covid pandemic, the Ukraine war and the cost of living. 
Not only have they failed within these parameters, but they're continous change in leadership shows the UK nationals that they have no trust within themselves.
attributes.background: Call a general election for a new government

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619781
